original: dge ba'i spyi gtsug mtshan mchog g-yas su 'khyil //

analyzed: dbu rgyan cod pan rgyal ba mchog gsang zhing

analyzed: rin chen spug dang autpal dra ba yi

analyzed: smin tshugs mdzes ba zla ba tshes ltar khyug

analyzed: rnam thar dpog yas chos sgo grangs med gnas

analyzed: mtho la yid tsam zur la legs ba mtshan
